Posts.Content: I had a bilateral mastectomy approximately 18 months ago with tram-flap reconstruction followed by implants (long story) and an additional lymph node biopsy 6 months ago (results were negative).  For the past week, I've had a steady throbbing in my left breast. It worries me a little.  Has anyone had experience with this?
Posts.Title: Throbbing Pain in Breast
